titleStmt.title: A fourme of prayer to be vsed in priuate houses euery mornyng and euenyng

notesStmt.note: "The prayers are those usually found at the end of Sternhold and Hopkins (cf. 2442, etc.) but this frag. does not belong to any of the known eds."--STC (2nd ed.).
Reproduction of original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
